tool_description: Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to product price, sales rank, and reviews data from Amazon in format
name: amazon-scraper-33
title: amazon-scraper-33

api_list.name: Get  Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-scraper-33.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08N5M7S6K"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scraper-33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-scraper-33.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-scraper-33.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
